TopicTitle: Project Testium: Eve Sample Return Mission (From the sea)

Articles.Content:
Note: I don't have pictures yet, as I am currently at uni.

A short time ago, the space probe Customdime III landed on Eve, in the Sea of Norvarh. Amongst the 60% Mercury and 35% Lead found in the Norvarh sea, the centrifuge on the Customdime isolated a new material, and testing of the density revealed a density of 300kg per litre. Jebediah ordered a robotic mission to bring one ton of Testium back to Kerbin, to find a use.
